[DQC.IFRS.0080.8615] ifrs-full:AmountRemovedFromReserveOfCashFlowHedgesAndIncludedInInitialCostOrOtherCarryingAmountOfNonfinancialAssetLiabilityOrFirmCommitmentForWhichFairValueHedgeAccountingIsApplied has a value of -81,000,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.
The properties of this ifrs-full:AmountRemovedFromReserveOfCashFlowHedgesAndIncludedInInitialCostOrOtherCarryingAmountOfNonfinancialAssetLiabilityOrFirmCommitmentForWhichFairValueHedgeAccountingIsApplied fact are: Period :2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/549300V62YJ9HTLRI486/2020-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/omv-2020-12-31.zip/omv-2020-12-31/reports/omv-2020-12-31.xhtml 8519

property.name: label
property.value: Amount removed from reserve of cash flow hedges and included in initial cost or other carrying amount of non-financial asset (liability) or firm commitment for which fair value hedge accounting is applied

entry.message:
[DQC.IFRS.0129.9625] It is expected that ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of 1,678,000,000 reported in the network role http://www.omv.com/geschaeftsbericht-2020/roles/KonzernGewinnUndVerlustrechnungFuerDasGeschaeftsjahr2020 should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ProfitLoss with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 1,753,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.omv.com/geschaeftsbericht-2020/roles/EntwicklungDesKonzernEigenkapitals2020. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2019-01-01 to 2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -6 Decimals of ProfitLoss : -6 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/549300V62YJ9HTLRI486/2020-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/omv-2020-12-31.zip/omv-2020-12-31/reports/omv-2020-12-31.xhtml 8519

property.name: label
property.value: Profit (loss), attributable to owners of parent
